title: Are BTC longs waiting for sub-$40K? 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
description: Bitcoin hodlers have been busy derisking — even before the ETF launch — and the BTC price desperately needs a liquidity boost.

title: JPMorgan CEO’s dig on Bitcoin and Satoshi spark BTC hodl rumors on Reddit
description: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon’s recent attack on the Bitcoin ecosystem made Redditors believe that it may be a calculated move to drive the price down to accumulate more BTC for himself.

title: Ethereum devs expect 10x lower rollup costs as Dencun upgrade hits testnets
description: Ethereum layer-2 rollups stand to benefit significantly from the systematic Dencun upgrade, which hit the Goerli testnet in January 2024.
